nodes.text: Carlitina Semla was a female Twi'lek who worked for the pharmaceutical company Culpharm during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Semla was the head of Culpharm Security and lived on the planet Cularin, where Culpharm was based. In about 32 BBY, some of Culpharm's specimen samples went missing, so Semla hired the Heroes of Cularin.

A short time afterward, Semla lead a Culpharm Security team in an attack on the Genasys Security Division, outside the shop Natural, in Gadrin. Genasys was a rival company of Culpharm and Semla had been tasked with preventing Genasys from making a deal with the Cerean biochemist Higgie Sethven.
